 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּ֫תֶר‎</span> **noun masculine** ==crown== ((perhaps Persian loan-word [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges Abh. 207</sup>); Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כִּתְרָא‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***the higher hump*** of a camel); — always construct, in combin <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְכוּת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> ***royal crown*** [[Esth.1.11|Esth 1:11]]; [[Esth.2.17|Esth 2:17]] (both of queen), [[Esth.6.8|Esth 6:8]] (of king).
